alert.note: Alert for Florence (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 26 at 8:32PM CDT until April 28 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near Florence affecting Florence, Iron and Dickinson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near Florence. * WHEN...From this evening to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding is confined to lowland and wooded land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 8.95 feet. - Forecast...The river is forecast to remain near or just above flood stage through Wednesday, then slowly fall below flood stage by Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning.
